name: WZRDS
description:
• tiny fast paced action game
  • fight super-predictable-wizardy-bosses
  • has a local multiplayer (!!!) to humiliate your friends
  • you have no hands

How to mind-control a generic wizard:

  • on desktop
    • hold "down" to stop, release to change direction
    • click "left" to shoot
  • on mobile
    • hold left side of screen to stop, release to change direction
    • tap on right side to shoot
  • on controllers (hella yeah we support controllers)
    • use bumpers
